SEARCH
Package UI

Class TableOverviewUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
UI.TableOverviewUI
public class TableOverviewUI extends BaseUI
The `TableOverviewUI` class extends the `BaseUI` class and represents the user interface for managing tables, table layouts, and table bookings in the restaurant management system.

  • Method Details

    • initializeUI

      private void initializeUI()
      Initializes the user interface components and layout.

    • updateTableAvailability

      void updateTableAvailability()
      Updates the table availability based on the selected date.

    • createTableLayout

      public void createTableLayout(LocalDate selectedDate)
      Creates the table layout by retrieving table information from the database and displaying table buttons in a grid layout. It also displays the waiter's name with the assigned table, checks which table is occupied or available, and highlights them accordingly.
      Parameters:
      selectedDate - The selected date for which to display the table layout.

    • showTableDetails

      private void showTableDetails(int tableId, LocalDate selectedDate)
      Shows the table details for the specified table and date.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table for which to show details.
      selectedDate - The selected date for which to show table details.

    • showMainUI

      private void showMainUI(LocalDate selectedDate)
      Shows the main UI with the updated table layout for the specified date.
      Parameters:
      selectedDate - The selected date for which to show the main UI.
